# Dos

---
class: primary
# Professional Presence

- LinkedIn Profile
    * Should have as much *relevant* information as possible
    * University, graduation year, future plans/goals
    * Professional looking photos (professional as in you look professional)
- Twitter account 
    * separate from your personal account
    * avoid political statements 
- Facebook Profile
    * Unless you have a business and you want to advertise on Facebook,
    * I suggest you use Facebook for family and friends only
    * Avoid adding / accepting colleagues, esp. those senior to you

# Your own website

---
class: primary
# Needed?

How do you know if you need to create a website? 

- Do others *in the field you want to be in* have one? 
- Do you need to show that you can produce original content? 
- Do you need to demonstrate a skillset or knowledge base (i.e. by writing blog posts)? 
- Do you need a place to collect all of your professional activity? (i.e. papers you've written, conferences attended, presentations given)
